ygData.subject: RE: Elemental and Purifying weaving
ygData.msgSnippet: you can stack elemental and guardian rhythms, but not elemental and purifying (ack i am going from memory, hope that is right i have been using mystic
ygData.messageBody:
you can stack elemental and guardian rhythms, but not elemental and
purifying (ack i am going from memory, hope that is right i have been using
mystic shielding too long).

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 22 High Elf Paladin
Tyria, Level 10 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> From: Joseph Mounts <jmounts@...>
>
> Hello,
>
> I am a level 16 Bard (love the dance song ;)) and am just now
> starting for
> fight in Unrest. I owuld love to be able to weave Purifying
> and Elemental
> rhythms for my party in there, but they don't seem to stack.
> In the song
> analysis, however, it says that they can be. Any suggestions?
>
> Elwe
> 16 Bard, Karana
>
